title: Vinaigrette
brief_description: Tribute to Melbourne’s ‘Skipping Girl’ and other historical landmarks. Leaving her neon home, the ‘Skipping Girl’ boards a tram bound for the city where she swaps her frock for a bodysuit. She spends the night clubbing, visiting Luna Park and enjoying the nightlife before her freedom and adventure come to an end as she returns home just before the ‘Nylex’ clock stikes midnight.
